# bookclubrunner

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Automate or otherwise streamline tasks associated with running R4DS book clubs, such as choosing the best time for a new cohort.

## Installation

You can install the development version of bookclubrunner from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("r4ds/bookclubrunner")
```
